title: The Generalized Mehler-Fock Transform over Lebesgue Spaces
content: This paper focuses on establishing boundedness properties and  Parseval-Goldstein type relations for the generalized Mehler-Fock transform initially introduced by B. L. J. Braaksma and B. M. Meulenbeld (Compositio Math.,{18}(3):235-287, 1967. Also, we derive an inversion formula for this transform over Lebesgue spaces.
